div.h2: Software Engineer (Internal Tools) - Technology Development Group

li.title: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: We're looking for a driven and dedicated internal tools software engineer to join the ARKit team. As a member of our fast-paced group, you will have the unique and rewarding opportunity to contribute to upcoming products that will delight and inspire millions of Apple’s customers.

ul.li: Experience leading a software development/computer vision team
Ability to hire key-talent and grow the team
Prior experience developing product-level computer vision/machine learning/deep learning algorithms
5+ years experience working on object recognition/classification algorithms
Excellent software design, problem solving and analytical skills

div.p:
Leverage your experience in order to help us deliver a next generation product. You will work in a cross-functional team which is developing innovative computer vision and machine learning algorithms. We research new and implement state of the art CV/ML algorithms.
Your job includes implementing tools supporting visual debugging, data annotation and algorithm evaluation. You will collaborate closely with our Computer Vision R&D engineers to find out which tools they need to carry out their research and product development tasks, and you will supervise and support them in usage of the internal tools being developed.
Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science or equivalent field, industry experience
Objective-C, Swift programming skills (preferred) Familiarity with VTK, OpenGL, PCL libraries (preferred) Familiarity with macOS, iOS operating systems (preferred) Familiarity with Xcode (preferred)
